name: Genesis Connecticut (Exclusivo) Robusto
additionalNotes:
"This cigar was formerly known as Ramon Bueso Exclusivo. It has been renamed and repackaged as Ramon Bueso Genesis Connecticut. The blend has not changed, and we are working through old packaging. You may receive it as either Exclusivo or Genesis Connecticut. "
